content.rendered:
The Art of Aesthetic Wellness

BOOK AN APPOINTMENT

Your Health & Beauty Haven

Founded by natural rejuvenation spa expert Valerie Terletskiy, SENSO offers a range of non-invasive treatments that work with your body to leave you glowing and feeling great. We believe that everyone deserves to feel beautiful.

fetchpriority="high" decoding="async" width="439" height="322" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Vector-1.svg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-7035" alt="background" />

Our Mission

Some of us may feel bad about the signs of aging. At SENSO’s rejuvenation spa, we’re dedicated to helping you feel comfortable and happy in your skin, exploring different ways to look younger and feel rejuvenated. 


Our goal is to enhance your natural beauty using the power of massage and other non-invasive treatments. We’re passionate about providing elevated, pampering experiences that deliver glowing results every time.

About us

decoding="async" width="573" height="644" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Rectangle-1.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6530" alt="" srcset="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Rectangle-1.jpg 573w, https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Rectangle-1-267x300.jpg 267w" sizes="(max-width: 573px) 100vw, 573px" />

Meet Our Founder, Valerie Terletskiy

The SENSO story is a personal one. It begins with our founder and natural rejuvenation spa expert, Valerie Terletskiy, and her own skincare journey. 

 

As she entered her 40s, Valerie started to experience rapid signs of age. From then on, she passionately explored and refined her skill and calling: non-invasive wellness treatments to boost your health and skin. 


For years, Valerie has shared her expertise with others with the goal of making them feel comfortable and confident again. Her treatments are both relaxing and therapeutic, with aesthetic results that speak for themselves.  At the heart of it, Valerie believes that beauty care is a combination of science, experience, art, and, of course, a little extra love.

decoding="async" width="573" height="545" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/image-54.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-7775" alt="Valerie Terletskiy" srcset="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/image-54.jpg 573w, https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/image-54-300x285.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 573px) 100vw, 573px" />

A healthier, balanced, and more confident you.

Our goal is to enhance your natural beauty using the power of massage and non-invasive treatments. We’re passionate about providing elevated, pampering experiences that deliver glowing results every time.

loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="317" height="399" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1.png" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6500" alt="" srcset="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1.png 317w, https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1-238x300.png 238w" sizes="(max-width: 317px) 100vw, 317px" />

loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="317" height="399" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1.png" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6500" alt="" srcset="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1.png 317w, https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Ресурс-1@2x-100-1-238x300.png 238w" sizes="(max-width: 317px) 100vw, 317px" />

Our Treatments

Explore our non-invasive treatments that rejuvenate the skin, body, and hair.

Face

Sculptural Face Massage 
Anti-Ageing Facials 

Book Now

Body

Hand Treatments
Anticellulite Massage 
Lymphatic Drainage

Book Now

Scalp

Hair Health Improvement  Trusted Hair Regeneration Techniques

Book Now

Before/after
decoding="async" class="swiper-slide-image" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/image-60.jpg" alt="before after" />

decoding="async" class="swiper-slide-image" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/5_2_Katya.jpg" alt="5_2_Katya" />

decoding="async" class="swiper-slide-image" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/3_1_Penny-scaled.jpg" alt="3_1_Penny" />
Learn more

What Sets Us Apart

loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="139" height="138" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon.png" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6600" alt="" />

Natural Beauty
Approach

We combine our expertise with a deep understanding of your needs to give you comprehensive guidance and treatment so you always leave feeling gorgeous inside and out.

loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="139" height="126" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon-1.png" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6601" alt="" />

Safe Methods & Techniques

Your health and safety are our priority. All of our treatments are supported by research and quality-tested to ensure beautiful results every time.

loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="129" height="138" src="https://sensoskinexperts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/icon-2.png" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-6602" alt="" />

Mind & Spirit Empowerment

Being happy in your skin is about more than youthful looks. Our skincare specialists integrate mind and body to give you the confidence to enjoy as you grow into a healthier, more radiant you.
